QuestData.Title: Battle of Snowblind Mesa
QuestData.Description: Your timing is fortunate. Our forces at Snowblind Mesa report seeing the Underking above ground.$b$bWhat is more, he is lightly guarded, and has the hammer with him. Thanks to your efforts, we can meet them in battle.$b$bMeet us at Snowblind Mesa and let us take the fight to Dargrul together.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Mayla Highmountain at Snowblind Mesa.
QuestData.RewardText: That... is a lot of drogbar.
